hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas reported it on the authority of Maimuana, the wife of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) took (a piece of goat's) shoulder at her place, and then offered prayer but did not perform ablution

chapter.ara-name: باب نَسْخِ " الْوُضُوءِ مِمَّا مَسَّتِ النَّارُ "
chapter.eng-name: Abrogation of wudu’ for that which has been touched by fire
